column4: Any help with this? GDM/Unity seem to be segfaulting recently.
GNOME Shell is a more intuitive approach to the desktop, similar to Unity but far more customizable and flexible.
To install it and preview, 'sudo apt-get install gnome-shell'
The gnome-shell package is only included in the Oneiric repository though. Earlier distros need a PPA which I can look up if you need.
